Class TabbedFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.TabbedFiles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class TabbedFiles
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    The control of operations that require knowledge of the documents in the tabs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      TabbedFiles(EditAreaFormat format, MainWin mw)

      Closes all tabs if the text contents of the documents are saved

      • openFileByChooser

        public void openFileByChooser()
        Opens a file that is selected in the file chooser.

      • save

        public boolean save(boolean update)
        Saves the text content of the selected tab.

        saveAs(boolean) is called if the selected tab is unnamed or if the content was read in from a file that no longer exists on the hard drive.

        Parameters:
        update - if the view (e.g. tab title, file view) is updated and if it is tried to retrieve a project
        Returns:
        if the text content was saved

      • saveAll

        public void saveAll()
        Saves the text content in all open documents

      • saveAs

        public boolean saveAs(boolean update)
        Saves the text content in the selected document as a new file that is specified in the file chooser
        Parameters:
        update - if the view (e.g. tab title, file view) is updated and it is tried to retrieve a project
        Returns:
        if the text content was saved

      • saveCopy

        public void saveCopy()
        Saves a copy of the content in the selected document to the file that is selected in the file chooser

      • close

        public void close(boolean createEmptyTab)
        Closes a tab if the text content is saved
        Parameters:
        createEmptyTab - true to create a new empty tab in case the tab to close is the only opened one

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll()
        Closes all tabs if the text contents of the documents are saved

      • exit

        public void exit()
        Exits the program if the text contents of all open documents are saved

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the text content in the selected document to a printer
